pathAssistantSteps.info: • 'Commercialisation Ready’ indicates that the research is suitable for commercialisation. The ‘Relationships’ tab allows you to create new opportunity(s) that are being progressed with partners for the commercialisation.

• 'Development’ indicates you are completing the supporting documents.
  • Once the development is complete, proceed with commercialisation ready. Use the ‘Commercialisation Ready Summary' to record development progress. Record the documents that have been created with links to where they are stored under the 'Documents’ tab.

• Disclosure’ indicates that you have identified new research that has potential to be commercialised.
  • Complete the ‘Engagement Summary’ field to capture meaningful detail on what you’re engaging about.
  • The ‘Relationships’ tab allows you to record who is involved and create the opportunity/opportunities that has/have arisen from your engagement.
  • Use ‘Notes’ to record relevant information to help you manage the relationship and/or opportunity. Use the ‘Activity’ panel to record your interactions and track tasks.
• ‘Evaluation’ indicates you are completing the due diligence and assessment analysis tabs to confirm that you have evaluated the readiness to progress.

• ‘On Hold’ indicates that engagement is not being progressed at the moment. Update the ‘On Hold Comment’ field to capture the reasons why the engagement is currently on hold.
  • Should the engagement become active again, change the ‘Stage' to the appropriate status.
